title: Plotting Classification Probability
description: This lab demonstrates how to plot the classification probability of different classifiers using Python Scikit-learn. We will use a 3 class dataset, and we classify it with a Support Vector classifier, L1 and L2 penalized logistic regression with either a One-Vs-Rest or multinomial setting, and Gaussian process classification.

meta.title: Plotting Classification Probability with Python Scikit-learn
meta.description: Learn how to plot the classification probability of different classifiers using Python Scikit-learn.
meta.keywords: support vector classifier, machine learning, python, logistic regression, classification probability, scikit learn, scikit-learn, machine learning playground, scikit-learn playground
